channel.title: ///\\\---Treason---///\\\
channel.description: Treason, list your opinions on it in here. Im personally against it i mean, anyone who backstabs their country deserves what is coming to them.

item.title: ///\\\---Treason---///\\\
item.dc:creator: @KyleGut3 KyleGut3
item.description:
@KyleGut3 wrote:

its not so much a mix of communism.

no country has EVER been truly communist, only socialist because no one can override human nature well enough to create perfect equality.

a capitalistic society, though cold at times, works WAY better for the overall economy of the country :D[damn commies]

The US is superior because we don't take no crap from anyone, and thats how it should be for the greatest country on earth

Read full topic

item.title: ///\\\---Treason---///\\\
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

IN theory communism isnt that bad. Well kinda. Its good that even one is equal. But its bad that the peopel who work hard get money taken off them. Most countrys have a bit of communism in them though. Communism is also meaning that all public services are owned by goverment (i think) so really New Zealand ( where i live) is partly communist because private business own post office/phone lines etc. And we have a system where the more you earn the more you get taxed.

/offtopic.

Depends. Also betrayal in times of war. It all depends on situation

Read full topic

item.title: ///\\\---Treason---///\\\
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

It depends. If your government started killing all of the ~insert race of people here~ and somebody asassinated the president, they would be tried and executed fortreason, even though they did a good deed. So treason could be the morally right choice hypothetically, and it's always the right choice in the mind of the betrayer, I don't really have anything against it. That being said, If I knew somebody had commited treason against my home counry (the US) then I would report it, but if I knew somebody was committing treason against France I wouldn't give a shit. Fuck France.

Read full topic
